summary: A comprehensive test suite for the PyTorch Lightning Trainer that validates its behavior across training, validation, testing, and prediction stages, covering checkpoint handling, callbacks, gradient clipping, device and strategy configuration, error handling, serialization, and resource management.
business_intent: To guarantee the robustness and correctness of the Lightning Trainer in production and research environments by automatically detecting regressions and edge‑case failures related to model lifecycle, distributed execution, checkpointing, and user‑defined callbacks.
